glsa.title: MaraDNS: CNAME Denial of Service
glsa.synopsis: MaraDNS is prone to a Denial of Service vulnerability impacting CNAME resolution.

background.p: MaraDNS is a package that implements the Domain Name Service (DNS) with resolver and caching ability.

description.p: Michael Krieger reported that a specially crafted DNS could prevent an authoritative canonical name (CNAME) record from being resolved because of an "improper rotation of resource records".

impact.p: A remote attacker could send specially crafted DNS packets to a vulnerable server, making it unable to resolve CNAME records.

resolution.p: All MaraDNS users should upgrade to the latest version:
